Name: Lucie Adult Game HD
About the game: About the game You play as a man who must take in a young intern, Lucie , as a favor to her best friend, Zoe. Help Lucie to discover her sexuality, and help your colleague Claire to get out of the clutches of an odious sexual blackmail Define your loyalty to Lucie and you can discover a personalized ending . Can you save your girls from the clutches of their new boss Pascal ? Why play Lucie ? => Realism above all! All the events in the game are 'possible' in real life. (No, all girls don't have sex the moment you look at them.) An unparalleled rise in desire like Babysitters game. Careful dialogues, without superfluous and unnecessary things. A complex plot. (Blackmail, infiltration, investigation, soft bondage, public exhibition) Great care has been taken for the noises and music. Translation made by a native American and 2 people are reviewing the english version. Many details in each render, including videogame cultural references and jokes. Your choices are key. You can choose either to romance or corrupt your intern Lucie. There are 4 endings. Progressive and exponential sex scene reward. Humor in renders, in dialogues... 'Lucie Adult Game' is a first-person POV adult adventure where you control the Male Main Character. Lucie is the only love interest. However you can (or not) fuck several other girls.
